name: Danko. Treasure map
description:
“Danko. Treasure map”   is an adventure in which the main character of Danko must save his friends and collect treasures in old ruins. You will need to go through the old ruins secret catacombs.  Along the way, Danko will meet dangerous animals, they guard crystals, it is undesirable to meet with them.  Danko will need to avoid numerous traps and dangers, solve hardcore puzzles. Danko will use portals, a protective helmet, an underwater mask and other devices to succeed. Hidden rooms and shelters will be opened by Danko using various keys and levers. Reveal the secrets hidden in oblivion and save your friends.

In game 3 different zones, each zone has its own traps, secrets and inhabitants

- all in the game 90 levels (30 levels in each zone)
- save friends and collect treasures
- find 3 valuable artifacts
- solve various puzzles

The game will be interesting for lovers of puzzles, logic puzzles, as well as for those who like games like “Boulder Dash” and “Socoban”

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP, 7
Processor: 1,8 GHz
Memory (RAM):  512 (XP)    1 GB (7/8)
Video Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible

Free disk space: 146 MB

Release Date: 2015
